title: punished for being false reported
body: So. I queued and got a team and 3 of them were in a party. so starts out normally and basically they just let me die and dont ever help. so i ask why they dont help me and blah blah blah, basically they reported me for hate speech for swearing. they said that swearing is not allowed. and after being reported that last time by those people i got a chat restriction and i dont want to have tier one punishment for something i didn't do. if i got reported 1 more time for actually BEING toxic then i would accept but i got pushed over the edge by false reported.

replies.body:
Riot check your chat logs, and if they come across a variety of "words" which trigger it's system then it will punish you.

You can talk to Support in a ticket about it.
Thats not how the system works. it is the tribune system, a spike in reports = punishment. it doesnt check logs at all. Please read up on this stuff before spreading false info.

It does check the logs now actually. The Tribunal system hasnt worked since Season 4, which was 3 years ago.
Most of the reports are done through checks in match history and chatlogs. 

Saying "Kys" once, and one person reporting you has banned a LOT of people.
Yes the system DOES check logs and the tribunal system has not been active in several years...you do not get punished just cause you get reported a lot unless the reports are justified.

While those chat logs weren't necessarily way over the top, I can definitely see where someone could have been offended by everything that was being said. I don't wanna give out your personal chat logs here on the boards, but feel free to hit up our player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that full context.
